title: Week 1: Pioneering
detail: Pioneering: Tripod wash-stand (sheer and square lashings) (P2). Also needed is pipe. x 4;

title: Week 1: Camping
desc: Camping: personal equipment and kit layout.
detail:
Camping: Lay out kit (C1,C2);
How to set out sleeping area in the tent for good sleep (C1). Roll out mat, sleeping bag, rucksack etc.;
Fire safety around campfires (C2, BW1);

Game: ?;

title: Week 2: Backwoods
desc: Camping: Types and group equipment, making a fishing rod.
detail:
Backwoods: Make fishing rod with bamboo stick & paper clip (BW2);

Game: Catch the fish game;

Camping: Different types of camp (standing, moving) (C?).;
Equipment required, personal and group (C?);

title: Week 3: Camping
desc: Camping: Tent pitching, Icelandic and Dome.
detail:
Camping: Setting up Icelandic tent, pitching and main parts (C1);
Setting up Dome tent, pitching and main parts (C1);

Environment: Leave no trace (BW3);

Game: LNT game ... Guess the breakdown time;

title: Week 4: Environment
desc: Spring cleanup. Annual litter picking for Special Interest badge.

title: Week 4: Emergencies
desc: Emergencies: safety and shelters. Water pour challange.
detail:
Emergencies: Importance of shelter and insulation (E2). Rule of 3;

Camping: Buddy system (C1);

Game: ?;

Backwoods: Leader waterpour challange: Making a shelter with tarp (E2);

title: Week 5: Camping
detail:
Camping: Pack a rucksack for weekend camp (C1);

Game: Pick and pack;

Emergencies: Minor injuries fractures, (burns, scalds and sunburn) (E3);

title: Event: County
desc: Cub skills day has been postponed.

title: Week 6: Camping
detail:
Camping: Camp layout, where to put fire, supply tent, sleeping tent, wood choping area;

Game: Cubs choice;

Backwoods: Different ways of cooking? (BW2). Tiangia, gas stove, firelog, candle stove (Need some help from scouts/ventures to set up);
Smores on firelog;
